original_text: Now it came to pass after the death of Saul, when David was returned from the slaughter of the Amalekites, and David had abode two days in Ziklag;
korean_text: 사울이 죽은 후에 다윗이 아말렉 사람을 쳐죽이고 돌아와 다윗이 시글락에서 이틀을 머물더니

sentences.original_text: Now it came to pass after the death of Saul
when David was returned from the slaughter of the Amalekites
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗이 아말렉 사람들을 학살하고 돌아왔을 때

sentences.original_text: and David had abode two days in Ziklag
